alert.note: Alert for Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Marion County through 715 PM EDT... At 632 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Williston Highlands to 7 miles west of Rainbow Lakes Estates to 12 miles northwest of Black Diamond. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rainbow Lakes Estates, Dunnellon, Flemington and Romeo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
